word_mean: 凝集素：与体内或体外同种抗原结合后即与颗粒抗原(如细菌)凝聚的抗体，亦指抗体外其它能凝集颗粒的物质如植物凝血素(lectin)

sentence.Network_en: An antigen that stimulates the production of a particular agglutinin an antibody.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何用来促使凝集原增殖的抗原物质.

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To investigate the interaction between cells and conjugates of 5 - fluorouracil - peanut agglutinin ( 5 - Fu - PNA ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究氟尿嘧啶 - 花生凝集 素 结合物与细胞的作用.

sentence.Network_en: Ricinus communis agglutinin ( RCA ) was used to identify the microglia with immunohistochemical SABC method.
sentence.Network_cn: 切片组织采用免疫组化SABC法以蓖麻凝集素标记小胶质细胞.
